title: Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+ 4.2 oz

description: 20% Vitamin C Serum with Vitamin E + Hyaluronic Acid SerumWhat is the Secret to Drop a Decade from Your Face?Secret #1 is Vitamin C for SkinApplying vitamin C to the skin can be 20 times more effective than taking it orallySafer, cheaper and easier than a facelift or chemical peelWhat Does Vitamin C Do for Your Face?- Counteract wrinkle formation by increasing collagen production- Protects against and repairs UV damage like discoloration and fine lines- Fortify against sun spots, discoloration, and environmental damage- Improved skin clarity and a brighter complexion- Powerful anti-oxidants, Vitamin C and E, work synergistically for maximumpotency and absorptionParaben and Alcohol FreeAirtight and opaque glass bottles ensure product integrity**30 Days Hassle-Free Unconditional Return Policy, No Questions Asked**

title: Skinceuticals  Emollience Rich, Restorative Moisturizer For Normal Or Dry Skin, 2-Ounce Jar
description: Hydrates and nourishes the skin with an exclusive combination of lipids, marine extracts and vitamin E. Optimal for dry skin. Three nutrient-rich Brazilian sea algae nourish and hydrate the skin, while oils of grape seed, rose hip, and macadamia restore and maintain moisture. Emollience is ideal for high altitudes and cold or dry climates.

title: Eufora Elevation Finishing Spray 10 oz
description: Eufora Elevate Firm-Hold Working Spray is a protein-enriched aerosol hair spray that conditions, strengthens, and protects against color fading.

title: Philosophy Miracle Worker Anti-Aging Moisturizer, 2 Ounce
description: Our anti-aging moisturizer helps replenish skin's natural moisture barrier, leaving it feeling satiny smooth. Resveratrol helps promote skin's vitality for a firm, radiant result. It helps support natural collagen, brighten a tired complexion and protect skin against environmental attack, the primary cause of premature aging.

description: Specifically proven results can only be achieved with 2 steps. The only peel on the market to combine 5 Alpha and Beta Hydroxy Acids PLUS Retinol, Ubiquinone, Resveratrol and a host of antioxidants, vitamins and soothing botanicals. The secret to youth and beauty does not come from a single ingredient- this product contains 44 ingredients to fight aging and produce immediate and lasting results.
